project.description:
Swing UI for the FolderPlaylistCreator application. Outstanding Items (to be done before release): + Put joolzminer on the about, and a more rich about. + Use SonarQube to check code quality and fix the most serious issues.

This should change the size of the fonts, and the frame. + Refactor the UI class (It's too large!) + Create a controller and apply MVC to the whole solution (remove business logic from the frame).
